subject: Re: Not the first!
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I just don't want to have to explain why I chose the dark path when I 
get over there. 

 Frank-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, rednellie <rednellie@...> wrote:
>
> Frank Sumption wrote:
> >  I like to point out that I was not the first to use this
> >  method.
> 
> That's what I like about you, Frank.  In a world where so many people 
> try to take credit where it isn't really due, you go out of your way 
to 
> make sure that the right person gets it.  If everyone in paranormal 
> research had your lack of ego, we'd probably make a lot more 
progress.  
> Just think of all the time people would save on chest thumping!
> 
> 
> Nellie
>
